channel.title: Server Message
channel.description: Hey Guys. My Servers Just About Done But Id Really Like To Add A ::Server Command. Basicly All I Want It To Do Is Say "[Server] My Message Here" And Send It To Everyone

item.title: Server Message

item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

im on delta source and i dont think that the server recognizes those

like sendMessage is sM(“message”);
does anyone know how to make this command work for delta source?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Message
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

[code]
}
else if (command.startsWith(“server”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
try {

		String announcement = command.substring(8);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll ="[~!ANNOUNCEMENT!~]: "+command.substring(8);
		sendMessage("You have successfully sent an announcement.");

		} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMessage("Wrong syntax! Use ::announce [ANNOUNCEMENT].");
		}

}[/code]

Read full topic
